response.overview: 35 years ago, under the powerful flood of Only Child Policy in China, Guozheng Wang sacrificed his wife, to give a birth to his son. After 35 years, under Guozheng’s morally blackmails, his son, Shuxin has grown up and been married with Zhiqiu. The situation of China's aging population is getting worse and worse at the same time. The government finally gave up the only child policy and introduced the three-child policy to the public. But Shuxin still doesn’t want a child at all. So Guozheng visits his son and daughter in law, to give his final order while his son does everything that he can do to against his father. But everything comes to the end as her portrait fallen on the ground.
response.title: Her Portrait
